Text.Name: Dan_BasePracticeDrug
Text.DisplayName: ยาเม็ดหล่อพื้นฐาน
Text.Desc: Unlock your body's potential, temporarily increasing Perception, Constitution and Intelligence by 30% each.

Text.Name: Modifier_Dan_JingYuan
Text.DisplayName: ยาฟื้นความแข็งแกร่ง
Text.Desc: By consuming the ยาฟื้นความแข็งแกร่ง, the ability of one's body to generate Stamina is improved within 7 days, increasing Hunger Consumption Rate and Stamina Conversion Rate.

Text.Name: Modifier_Dan_JingYuan2
Text.DisplayName: ยาเม็ดโสม
Text.Desc: By consuming the ยาเม็ดโสม, the ability of one's body to generate Stamina is improved within 14 days, increasing Hunger Consumption Rate and Stamina Conversion Rate.

Text.Name: Modifier_Dan_JingYuan3
Text.DisplayName: ผงแกนยางสน
Text.Desc: By consuming the ผงแกนยางสน, the ability of one's body to generate Stamina is improved within 28 days, increasing Hunger Consumption Rate and Stamina Conversion Rate.

Text.Name: Dan_Ling1
Text.DisplayName: ยาเม็ดฟื้นฟูพลังชี่
Text.Desc: Increases พลังชี่ recovery rate by 2,000%.

Text.Name: Dan_Ling2
Text.DisplayName: ยาเม็ดดวงตะวัน

Text.Name: Dan_Ling3
Text.DisplayName: ผงพลังเทพ
Text.Desc: Increases ค่าพลังชี่สูงสุด by 100,000.

Text.Name: Dan_Defense
Text.DisplayName: ยาเม็ดโล่ห์
Text.Desc: Increases your base Protection strength by 30%.

Text.Name: Dan_FiveBaseFromLife
Text.DisplayName: Pill of the Five Clingings

Text.Name: Dan_FiveBase1
Text.DisplayName: ยาเม็ดสวรรค์
Text.Desc: Increases Perception by 30% for 48 hours.

Text.Name: Dan_FiveBase2
Text.DisplayName: ยาเม็ดแผ่นดิน
Text.Desc: Increases Constitution by 30% for 48 hours.

Text.Name: Dan_FiveBase3
Text.DisplayName: ยาเม็ดอีเธอร์
Text.Desc: Increases Charisma by 30% for 48 hours.

Text.Name: Dan_FiveBase4
Text.DisplayName: ยาเม็ดเมธา
Text.Desc: Increases Intelligence by 30% for 48 hours.

Text.Name: Dan_FiveBase5
Text.DisplayName: ยาเม็ดผาสุก
Text.Desc: Increases Luck by 30% for 48 hours.

Text.Name: Dan_PracticeRate
Text.DisplayName: Increases the chance of successfully breakthroughing.

Text.Name: Dan_PracticeSpeed
Text.DisplayName: Increases Cultivation speed (Yellowbud).

Text.Name: Dan_HundredRefine
Text.DisplayName: Increases Cultivation speed (Samsara).

Text.Name: Dan_CalmDown
Text.DisplayName: ยาเม็ดพิศุทธิ์
Text.Desc: Consumption of the ยาเม็ดพิศุทธิ์ will calm one's Mental State to a certain extent, and reduces the fluctuation of mood within one day.

Text.Name: Dan_Happiness
Text.DisplayName: ยาเม็ดเคลิ้มสุข
Text.Desc: Consumption of the ยาเม็ดเคลิ้มสุข will immerse one in happiness within two days, but it greatly hinders work efficiency.

Text.Name: Dan_NoHunger
Text.DisplayName: ยาเม็ดพลังอด
Text.Desc: Consumption of ยาเม็ดพลังอด grants one the ability of พลังชี่ Absorption for two days, enabling auto-replenishment of Hunger.

Text.Name: Dan_NoHunger1
Text.DisplayName: ยาเม็ดบำรุง
Text.Desc: Consumption of the ยาเม็ดบำรุง decreases one's Hunger and ความเหนื่อยล้า rates within two days.

Text.Name: Dan_NoHunger2
Text.DisplayName: ยาเม็ดอดอาหาร
Text.Desc: Consumption of ยาเม็ดอดอาหาร will significantly decrease the speed at which one consumes food and water.

Text.Name: Dan_LostSoul
Text.DisplayName: ยาเม็ดระงับประสาท
Text.Desc: Very basic mineral-based pill. Consuming this pill will cause one's brain function to be repressed and fell into a coma for 3 whole days.

Text.Name: Dan_IncreaseLife1
Text.DisplayName: ยาเม็ดยืดชีวิต

Text.Name: Dan_IncreaseLife2
Text.DisplayName: ยาวิเศษวิตาทา

Text.Name: Dan_IncreaseLife3
Text.DisplayName: ยาเม็ดชั่วนิรันดร์

Text.Name: Dan_IncreaseLife4
Text.DisplayName: ยาเม็ดฟื้นฟูชีวิต

Text.Name: Dan_IncreaseLife5
Text.DisplayName: ยาเม็ดวันใหม่

Text.Name: Dan_IncreaseLife6
Text.DisplayName: น้ำพุชีวิต

Text.Name: Dan_IncreaseLife7
Text.DisplayName: เห็ดหลินจือ

Text.Name: Dan_IncreaseLife8
Text.DisplayName: เห็ดหลินจือม่วง

Text.Name: Modifier_Item_Anodyne
Text.DisplayName: Painkiller
Text.Desc: Relieve pain. Its effect will last around 5 days.

Text.Name: Modifier_Item_Mint
Text.DisplayName: ใบพิศุทธิ์

Text.Name: Modifier_Item_EarthEssence1_1
Text.DisplayName: Evil Essence

Text.Name: Modifier_Item_Ginseng
Text.DisplayName: โสม
Text.Desc: Improves natural resilience for a short period of time.

Text.Name: Modifier_Item_RedGinseng
Text.DisplayName: โสมแดง
Text.Desc: Significantly improves natural resilience for a short period of time.

Text.Name: Modifier_Item_RedGinseng1
Text.DisplayName: โสมแดง (Fruit)
Text.Desc: Increases ค่าพลังชี่สูงสุด.

Text.Name: Modifier_Item_Laxative
Text.DisplayName: ยาถ่าย

Text.Name: Modifier_Item_Laxative1
Text.DisplayName: Weakening
Text.Desc: After taking the ยาถ่าย, one would be considerably weakened and has a very low work efficiency.

Text.Name: Modifier_Item_LongXianGuo
Text.DisplayName: ผลไม้อำพัน
Text.Desc: By consuming the Amber Fruit, one becomes immune to hunger and ความเหนื่อยล้า within half a day.

Text.Name: Modifier_Item_LingWater
Text.DisplayName: น้ำค้างวิญญาณ
Text.Desc: Consumption of น้ำค้างวิญญาณ will greatly improve one's recovery rate from wound for a short period of time.

Text.Name: Dan_LingStone
Text.DisplayName: Advanced พลังชี่ Resonance
Text.Desc: Use หินวิญญาณ in cultivation to resonate with พลังชี่ energies, greatly increasing one's พลังชี่ Recovery Rate and Cultivation Speed.

Text.Name: Dan_LingCrystal
Text.DisplayName: Advanced พลังชี่ Resonance
Text.Desc: Use Spirit Crystal in cultivation to deeply resonate with พลังชี่ energies, greatly increasing one's พลังชี่ Recovery Rate and Cultivation Speed.

Text.DisplayName: ยาเม็ดสงบ

Text.Name: Dan_IncreaseNeckCountdown2
Text.DisplayName: ยาเม็ดพิพากษา

Text.DisplayName: ยาเม็ดขยะ
Text.Desc: After taking that strange elixir pill, my body was suddenly shrunk.

Text.Name: Dan_Fail2
Text.DisplayName: ยาเม็ดขยะ
Text.Desc: After taking that strange elixir pill, my body was suddenly enlarged.

Text.Name: Dan_Soul4

Text.Desc: Consume part of your lifespan to gain superb intelligence for 2 hours, but it will leave permanent damage to intelligence afterwards.

Text.Name: Modifier_Item_BossZhuLong_Meat
